name: Mim\u00ec: the spinning top evolution for your tablet (Canceled)
blurb: The virtuality merges with reality. The first device that can interact autonomously with capacitive screens (iPad, Galaxy and more)

rewards.reward: You will receive our heartfelt thanks and a unique Mim\u00ec wallpaper for your device.
You will receive our heartfelt thanks, a unique Mim\u00ec wallpaper for your device and one exclusive Mim\u00ec sticker. Shipping included.
Get one exclusive T-Shirt with Mim\u00ec logo. We'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Christmas Complete Mim\u00ec Edition: Get one Mim\u00ec, one dress (in any color of your choice) and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games). Check out the project details for all options - we'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Mim\u00ec. Get one Mim\u00ec, one dress (in any color of your choice) and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games). Check out the project details for all options - we'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Change your dress: Get one Mim\u00ec, two dresses (in any color of your choice) and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games) Check out the project details for all options - we'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Limited "Complete Mim\u00ec" Pledge: Get one Mim\u00ec, one dress (in any color of your choice) and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games). Check out the project details for all options - we'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Multiplayer starter pack: Get two Mim\u00ec, two dresses (in any color of your choice) and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games). Check out the project details for all options - we'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Complete Mim\u00ec + T-Shirt + Sticker: Get one Mim\u00ec, one dress (in any color of your choice), one exclusive T-Shirt with Mim\u00ec logo, Mim\u00ec sticker and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games). Check out the project details for all options - we'll send a survey at the end of the campaign so you can select your preferences. Shipping included.

Get the exclusive Kickstarter limited Black and White edition containing 2 Mim\u00ec (in a "pure black" and in a "pure white\u201d dress) in a package signed by Escape Studios team. On the package there will be also the names of all backers that will get this limited edition, and their names will be engraved in Mim\u00ec's history on the official website (www.mimi-land.com) and Mim\u00ec Land application. You\u2019ll also receive the exclusive Mim\u00ec T-Shirt, the sticker and "Mim\u00ec Land" App.

Get the Mim\u00ec SDK containing demo applications with full sourcecode for Cocos2d on iOS, the high resolution image to be inserted in your app to show it's fully compatible with Mim\u00ec and the exclusive Kickstarter limited "Black and White edition" containing 2 Mim\u00ec, one "pure black" dress and one "pure white" dress in the special limited Black & White package signed by Escape Studios team, one exclusive T-Shirt with Mim\u00ec logo and the Mim\u00ec Sticker. Shipping included.

All in Complete Collection Rainbow Pack: Get eight Mim\u00ec, eight dresses (in all available colors), one exclusive T-Shirt with Mim\u00ec logo, the Mim\u00ec sticker and Mim\u00ec Land App (101 games). and your name will be engraved in Mim\u00ec's history on the official website (www.mimi-land.com) and Mim\u00ec Land application.. Shipping included.
